original: @#/_/ga  /ti'i rim pa gnyis pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: @#/_/ga  /ti'i rim pa gnyis pa bzhugs so//
translated: The Two Stages🔽The teachings of the buddhas

original: /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa/_/rim pa gnyis la yang
analyzed: /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa/_/rim pa gnyis la yang
translated: are perfectly contained within the two stages:

original: dag gnas/_/skyed pa yi ni rim pa dang /_/rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa'o/_/a
analyzed: dag gnas/_/skyed pa yi ni rim pa dang /_/rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa'o/_/a
translated: the stage of generation and the stage of completion.🔽The stage of generation arises from the long vowel a

original: yig ring po las byung ba/_/bsrung dang lha rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/yi ge
analyzed: yig ring po las byung ba/_/bsrung dang lha rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/yi ge
translated: and is the place where the protection wheel and deities abide.🔽The excellent shape of the syllable e

original: e dbyibs bzang po la/_/dbus su pam yig brgyan pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings
analyzed: e dbyibs bzang po la/_/dbus su pam yig brgyan pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings
translated: is adorned in the center with the syllable paṃ.🔽The pride of the dharmadhātu🔽is the nonconceptual abiding in entities.

original: kyis nga rgyal gyis/_/dngos por gnas pa spros pa med/_/de nyid chos dbyings
analyzed: kyis nga rgyal gyis/_/dngos por gnas pa spros pa med/_/de nyid chos dbyings
translated: That is the gnosis of the dharmadhātu.

original: ye shes so/_/de nas sems can don mdzad gzugs/_/mtshhan dang dpe byad
analyzed: ye shes so/_/de nas sems can don mdzad gzugs/_/mtshhan dang dpe byad
translated: Then, the form that performs benefits for sentient beings🔽is adorned with the major and minor marks.

original: kyis brgyan pa/_/ka li tha ma las byung bas/_/kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku/_/
analyzed: kyis brgyan pa/_/ka li tha ma las byung bas/_/kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku/_/
translated: Arising from the final ka li, the form of Samantabhadra🔽is the mirrorlike gnosis.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/dang po a yig thung las byung /_/rang bzhin med
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/dang po a yig thung las byung /_/rang bzhin med
translated: Arising from the first short a,🔽the natureless form🔽is the form of Samantabhadrī.

original: de rang bzhin gzugs/_/kun tu bzang mo nyid kyi sku/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
analyzed: de rang bzhin gzugs/_/kun tu bzang mo nyid kyi sku/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
translated: That is the gnosis of uniformity.

original: shes so/_/de yi a gzugs bzang po ste/_/bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i
analyzed: shes so/_/de yi a gzugs bzang po ste/_/bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i
translated: the abode of the Sugatas.🔽In that abode, by individual effort,

original: gnas/_/gnas der so sor 'bad pa yis/_/sems de phra mo so sor gsal//
analyzed: gnas/_/gnas der so sor 'bad pa yis/_/sems de phra mo so sor gsal//
translated: that mind is individually clear and subtle.🔽Since it arises from discernment,

original: so sor rtogs pa las byung bas/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so/_/de la
analyzed: so sor rtogs pa las byung bas/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so/_/de la
translated: it is the exalted wisdom of discernment.🔽Having perfected the form,🔽it becomes the many forms,

original: gzugs su rdzogs byas te/_/rnam pa du ma'i skur gyur pa/_/sum cu drug gam
analyzed: gzugs su rdzogs byas te/_/rnam pa du ma'i skur gyur pa/_/sum cu drug gam
translated: thirty-six,🔽thirty-eight,🔽forty-two, or forty-four.

original: sum cu brgyad/_/bzhi bcu gnyis sam bzhi bcu bzhi/_/bya ba nan tan ye
analyzed: sum cu brgyad/_/bzhi bcu gnyis sam bzhi bcu bzhi/_/bya ba nan tan ye
translated: The exalted wisdom of activities🔽is thus.🔽The generation of the deities

original: shes te/_/de ltar lha rnams bskyed pa ni/_/bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa'o/_/
analyzed: shes te/_/de ltar lha rnams bskyed pa ni/_/bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa'o/_/
translated: is said to be the stage of generation.🔽Having well-abided in that samādhi,

original: ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa yis/_/
analyzed: ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa yis/_/
translated: those who desire the stage of completion🔽instantly clarify the deities.

original: skad cig nyid la lha rnams gsal/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bskyed rims te/_/
analyzed: skad cig nyid la lha rnams gsal/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bskyed rims te/_/
translated: The stage of generation of the stage of completion🔽is the completion of the stage of generation.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rdzogs pa'o/_/ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas/_/
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rdzogs pa'o/_/ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas/_/
translated: Having well-abided in that samādhi,

original: yang ni rnam rtog de mi sgom/_/rtog med kyang ni sgom mi bya/_/rtog dang mi rtog
analyzed: yang ni rnam rtog de mi sgom/_/rtog med kyang ni sgom mi bya/_/rtog dang mi rtog
translated: The nonduality of thought and nonthought🔽is naturally luminous,

original: gnyis med de/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal te/_/dngos po mtshhan mar
analyzed: gnyis med de/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal te/_/dngos po mtshhan mar
translated: without reference to an entity or a sign.🔽Abiding in the state of nonreference,

original: dmigs pa med/_/dmigs su med pa'i ngang gnas pa/_/rnam par rtog pa skye
analyzed: dmigs pa med/_/dmigs su med pa'i ngang gnas pa/_/rnam par rtog pa skye
translated: thought does not arise.🔽If there is no arising, there is no ceasing.

original: ba med/_/skye ba med na 'gag pa med/_/skye 'gag gnyis su mi dgos pa/_/
analyzed: ba med/_/skye ba med na 'gag pa med/_/skye 'gag gnyis su mi dgos pa/_/
translated: The nonduality of arising and ceasing

original: de nyid gnyis su med pa ste/_/dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/_/sangs
analyzed: de nyid gnyis su med pa ste/_/dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/_/sangs
translated: is the nonduality of space and wisdom,

original: rgyas sems can gnyis su med/_/de ltar gnas nas mngon gyur pa/_/tshhe 'di
analyzed: rgyas sems can gnyis su med/_/de ltar gnas nas mngon gyur pa/_/tshhe 'di
translated: the nonduality of buddhas and sentient beings.🔽Having realized that to be the case,🔽one becomes a buddha in this very life.

original: nyid las sangs rgyas te/_/'bras bu chos kyi sku zhes bshad/_/dpal gsang
analyzed: nyid las sangs rgyas te/_/'bras bu chos kyi sku zhes bshad/_/dpal gsang
translated: The result is explained to be the dharmakāya.🔽The meaning of the two stages of the glorious Guhyagarbha

original: ba'i snying po'i rim pa gnyis kyi don/_rgyal po in tra b+hu d+his mdzad pa rdzogs
analyzed: ba'i snying po'i rim pa gnyis kyi don/_rgyal po in tra b+hu d+his mdzad pa rdzogs
translated: was composed by King Indrabhūti.

original: so/_/   soti'i rim pa gnyis pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: so/_/   soti'i rim pa gnyis pa bzhugs so//
translated: The Two Stages of So
